verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after this כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיִּשְׁאַל֩ <S%H7592><s%> enquired דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> that David בַּֽיהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying הַאֶעֱלֶ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> Shall I go up בְּאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> into any עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> of the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him עֲלֵ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> unto him Go up וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> Where אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> Whither shall I go up וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> ? And he said חֶבְרֹֽנָה׃ <S%H2275><s%> Unto Hebron

וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> So David וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> thither and his two נָשָׁ֑יו <S%H802><s%> wives אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H293><s%> also Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵלִ֔ית <S%H3159><s%> the Jezreelitess וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <S%H26><s%> and Abigail אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife נָבָ֥ל <S%H5037><s%> Nabal's הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽי׃ <S%H3761><s%> the Carmelite

וַאֲנָשָׁ֧יו <S%H376><s%> every man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with הֶעֱלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> bring up דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> that [were] with him did David אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each וּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> with his household וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they dwelt בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיִּמְשְׁחוּ־ <S%H4886><s%> and there they anointed שָׁ֧ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> David לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> over the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <S%H5046><s%> And they told לְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַנְשֵׁי֙ <S%H376><s%> it was the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who קָבְר֖וּ <S%H6912><s%> [were they] that buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> Saul ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to בְּרֻכִ֤ים <S%H1288><s%> unto them Blessed אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] ye of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> because עֲשִׂיתֶ֜ם <S%H6213><s%> that ye have shewed הַחֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> this kindness הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H113><s%> unto your lord עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> [even] unto Saul וַֽתִּקְבְּר֖וּ <S%H6912><s%> and have buried אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יַֽעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> shew יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And now the LORD עִמָּכֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וֶאֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> and truth וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> unto you and I also will requite אִתְּכֶם֙ <S%H854><s%> for הַטּוֹבָ֣ה <S%H2896><s%> you this kindness הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> to you אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> because ye have done הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> Now תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <S%H2388><s%> be strengthened יְדֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> Therefore now let your hands וִֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> able כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H113><s%> for your master שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> מָשְׁח֧וּ <S%H4886><s%> have anointed בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> and also the house יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> me king עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over פ

וְאַבְנֵ֣ר <S%H74><s%> But Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֔ר <S%H5369><s%> of Ner שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> captain צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> host אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> his לְשָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul's לָקַ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֥ישׁ בֹּ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H378><s%> Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖הוּ <S%H5674><s%> and brought him over מַחֲנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4266><s%> to Mahanaim

וַיַּמְלִכֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4427><s%> And made him king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> over Gilead וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over הָאֲשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H805><s%> and over the Ashurites וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> over יִזְרְעֶ֑אל <S%H3157><s%> and over Jezreel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> and over Ephraim וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> and over Benjamin וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and over all Israel כֻּלֹּֽה׃ <S%H3605><s%> all פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> [was] forty שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> years אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֣שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's בְּמָלְכוֹ֙ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וּשְׁתַּ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years מָלָ֑ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> however בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> But the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> followed דָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> abundance הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> age אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> that David מֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> was king בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> over the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> was seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> and six חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2320><s%> months ס

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> went out אַבְנֵ֣ר <S%H74><s%> And Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֔ר <S%H5369><s%> of Ner וְעַבְדֵ֖י <S%H5650><s%> and the servants אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֣שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> of Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul מִֽמַּחֲנַ֖יִם <S%H4266><s%> from Mahanaim גִּבְעֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H1391><s%> to Gibeon

וְיוֹאָ֨ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֜ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah וְעַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> and the servants דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David יָֽצְא֔וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out וַֽיִּפְגְּשׁ֛וּם <S%H6298><s%> and met עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by בְּרֵכַ֥ת <S%H1295><s%> by the pool גִּבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together וַיֵּ֨שְׁב֜וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they sat down אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַבְּרֵכָה֙ <S%H1295><s%> the one on the one side of the pool מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> the one וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַבְּרֵכָ֖ה <S%H1295><s%> and the other on the other side of the pool מִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> side

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְנֵר֙ <S%H74><s%> And Abner אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> to Joab יָק֤וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> now arise נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Now הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> Let the young men וִֽישַׂחֲק֖וּ <S%H7832><s%> and play לְפָנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> us And Joab יָקֻֽמוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> Let them arise

וַיָּקֻ֖מוּ <S%H6965><s%> Then there arose וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> and went over בְמִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> by number שְׁנֵ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten לְבִנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וּלְאִ֥ישׁ בֹּ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H378><s%> which [pertained] to Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten מֵעַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> of the servants דָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

וַֽיַּחֲזִ֜קוּ <S%H2388><s%> And they caught אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> by the head רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his fellow וְחַרְבּוֹ֙ <S%H2719><s%> and [thrust] his sword בְּצַ֣ד <S%H6654><s%> side רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> in his fellow's וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> so they fell down יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> was called לַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> wherefore that place הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חֶלְקַ֥ת הַצֻּרִ֖ים <S%H2521><s%> Helkathhazzurim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1391><s%> which [is] in Gibeon

וַתְּהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> battle קָשָׁ֥ה <S%H7186><s%> sore עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> And there was a very בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיִּנָּ֤גֶף <S%H5062><s%> was beaten אַבְנֵר֙ <S%H74><s%> and Abner וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> the servants דָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> were there שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> And there were three בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons צְרוּיָ֔ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah יוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> there Joab וַאֲבִישַׁ֖י <S%H52><s%> and Abishai וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֑ל <S%H6214><s%> and Asahel וַעֲשָׂהאֵל֙ <S%H6214><s%> and Asahel קַ֣ל <S%H7031><s%> [was as] light בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> of foot כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> as a הַצְּבָיִ֖ם <S%H6643><s%> roe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> wild
